verses.name: 1 Kings 17:22
verses.text: And the Lord heard the voice of Elijah; and the soul of the child came into him again, and he revived.

verses.name: 1 Kings 17:23
verses.text: And Elijah took the child, and brought him down out of the chamber into the house, and delivered him unto his mother: and Elijah said, See, thy son liveth.

verses.name: 1 Kings 17:24
verses.text: And the woman said to Elijah, Now by this I know that thou art a man of God, and that the word of the Lord in thy mouth is truth.
